ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: gWidgets provides a toolkit-independent API for building interactive GUIs. At least one of the 'gWidgetsXXX packages', such as gWidgetstcltk, needs to be installed. Some icons are on loan from the scigraphica project http

gWidgets provides a toolkit-independent API for building interactive GUIs. At least one of the 'gWidgetsXXX packages', such as gWidgetstcltk, needs to be installed. Some icons are on loan from the scigraphica project http

name: r-gwidgets
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.0-54.2" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-gwidgets
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: gWidgets_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/gWidgets_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/gWidgets/gWidgets_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: bb5bd9a0524c858271f439c6a258c0b73887a2dddd5fa01f8ef1bc4c8c1fd508

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 5
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('gWidgets')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('gWidgets')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/gWidgets/index.html
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: gWidgets provides a toolkit-independent API for building interactive GUIs. At least one of the 'gWidgetsXXX packages', such as gWidgetstcltk, needs to be installed. Some icons are on loan from the scigraphica project http
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - MathiasHaudgaard
    - FrodePedersen
    - ArneKr
